org.jerkar.tool

Class JkInit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.tool.JkInit

  • public final class JkInit
extends java.lang.Object
    Initializer for build instances. It instantiates build class and inject values according command line and option files.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends JkBuild>
      T      		 instanceOf(java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.io.File baseDir, java.lang.String... args)
      Creates an instance of the specified build class.
      static <T extends JkBuild>
      T      		 instanceOf(java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.lang.String... args)
      Creates an instance of the specified build class.
      static <T extends JkBuild>
      T      		 instanceOf(java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.lang.String[] args, java.lang.String... extraArgs)
      As instanceOf(Class, String...) but you can specified the command line using two distinct arrays that will be concatenated.
      static <T extends JkBuild>
      T      		 instanceOf(java.io.File base, java.lang.String... args)
      Creates an instance of the build class for the specified project.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • instanceOf

        public static <T extends JkBuild> T instanceOf(java.io.File base,
                                               java.lang.String... args)
        Creates an instance of the build class for the specified project. It is slower than instanceOf(Class, String...) cause it needs compilation prior instantiating the object.

      • instanceOf

        public static <T extends JkBuild> T instanceOf(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                               java.lang.String... args)
        Creates an instance of the specified build class. the build instance is configured according specified command line arguments and option files found in running environment.

      • instanceOf

        public static <T extends JkBuild> T instanceOf(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                               java.io.File baseDir,
                                               java.lang.String... args)
        Creates an instance of the specified build class. the build instance is configured according specified command line arguments and option files found in running environment. The base directory is the specified one.

      • instanceOf

        public static <T extends JkBuild> T instanceOf(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                               java.lang.String[] args,
                                               java.lang.String... extraArgs)
        As instanceOf(Class, String...) but you can specified the command line using two distinct arrays that will be concatenated.
